subject: Horse Racing
Horses
Breeding of Animals
lead_paragraph: Ernie Paragallo, the prominent New York thoroughbred breeder and owner whose horses were found emaciated last month, also had horses rescued from his farm in 2007.
snippet: Ernie Paragallo, the prominent New York thoroughbred breeder and owner whose horses were found emaciated last month, also had horses rescued from his farm in 2007.
